thread.title: Mom charged for live-streaming 10-year-old son driving car
thread.title_full: Mom charged for live-streaming 10-year-old son driving car | New York Post

author: Associated Press
title: Mom charged for live-streaming 10-year-old son driving car
text:
MONROE, Conn. — A Connecticut woman has been accused of letting her 10-year-old son drive her car on public roads and streaming it on Facebook Live.
Monroe resident Lisa Nussbaum was charged Friday with risk of injury or impairing morals of a minor.
Police say Nussbaum was arrested after several residents complained to officers of a live-streaming video on Facebook showing a child driving a car.
Police say officers determined Nussbaum was recording her son drive the car on public roads throughout the town. Police say the video was taken from the passenger seat of Nussbaum’s vehicle.
The Connecticut Post reports Nussbaum on Monday hinted there may be more to the story. Nussbaum was released on a promise to appear in Superior Court in Bridgeport on Friday.
